snippet: After a yearlong investigation, the panel said it found evidence of an array of offenses, including crimes against humanity, in a report that will be released on Monday.
abstract: United Nations Human Rights Council report concludes that North Korean government has committed many crimes against humanity through policies designed to sustain its political system; recommends matter be referred to International Criminal Court.
lead_paragraph: After a yearlong investigation, the panel said it found evidence of an array of offenses, including crimes against humanity, in a report that will be released on Monday.

headline.main: U.N. Panel Finds Crimes Against Humanity in North Korea
headline.print_headline: U.N. Panel Finds Crimes Against Humanity in North Korea

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
